bill_title: authorize the use of certain devices for predator control.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the use of certain devices for predator control. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 40-36 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: For the purpose of controlling predators for the protection of livestock, any person who has been certified and licensed pursuant to this Act may use a device designed to inject or apply poisonous substances to the predatory animal, including devices commonly known as M-44s and intended for use in the control of coyotes. No person may use such a device unless the person has been certified pursuant to this section and has obtained a license. The license shall be renewed each year. The Game, Fish and Parks Commission shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 specifying the types of devices and substances that may be used and to authorize the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to certify and license prospective users of such devices and to impose fees necessary to cover the department's costs associated with such licensing and certification. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
